Detailed Description

Struct containing the output vector of a getTurnDescriptions() operation.

Parameters:
fromConIndex The CCE this Struct comes from.
toConIndex The CCE this Struct leads to.
description The turndescription of the connection.
exitCount The exit count of the connection.
debug Flag indicating that this turndescription should be debuged.
